oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: A Salute to Ray Charles - featuring Descendants of Reality
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Descendants of Reality performance saluting Ray Charles -- Performance recorded from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum. Companion to the Ray Charles exhibit.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Descendants of Reality;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: songs performed include "Hallalujah, I Love Him So" -- "I Don't Need No Doctor" -- "You Can Make It" -- "Hit The Road, Jack" -- "You Are So Beautiful" -- "What'd I Say" -- others
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Charles, Ray, 1930-2004; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.); Descendants of Reality (musical group)
